»And we have always fought vigorously, and with strength, against those who wish to destroy us, while building up our state. » »
»This is what we have done this time as well. We struck Hamas very hard.» »
»The IDF & the ISA killed almost 1000 terrorists, struck at the heads of the orgs, at their network of tunnels and terrorist high-rises. » »

Our youth are patriots and grow up in the national spirit, educate them. Our young people should be educated, educated.

There is a free society in Azerbaijan, there are all democratic institutions and they operate successfully.
All freedom - freedom of speech, freedom of conscience, freedom of the press, freedom of the Internet. There is no censorship.
Azerbaijani society is a free society and this is our great achievement.
The guarantor of stability and development in Azerbaijan is the Azerbaijani people, the work done, the developing cities and the developing country.
At present, all the occupied lands will be like Horadiz after the occupation.
We will restore Fuzuli, now totally destroyed Agdam, Shushan and all other cities.
I am absolutely convinced that we will restore our territorial integrity. Azerbaijan is able to do this, and it is inevitable.
Righteousness is on our side. Nagorno-Karabakh is an ancient Azerbaijani land.
No country will recognize or recognize the so-called "Nagorno-Karabakh Republic" as a republic.
Azerbaijani society is united for one action.
This is the development of Azerbaijan, the process of modern state building and the return of the occupied territories.

(1/4) As I made clear in my Commons statement, my first priority as PM is to make sure we do everything possible to keep our people safe.
(2/4) We are an open, tolerant and free nation. But we cannot stand by and allow our openness to be confused with a tolerance of extremism.
(3/4) Adhering to British values is not an option or a choice - it is a duty for those who live in these islands.
(4/4) It is only by standing up for these values that we will defeat extremism, protect our way of life and keep all our people safe.
